name: Lucky Pirate
description:
The Lucky Pirate is a free mobile game between luck, strategy and deck building. Download it as an Android App or iOS App. Early levels can be quite easy but it quickly becomes a real challenge!

You can also play it in your browser. But it comes with two limitations:

  1. The web version does not have a leaderboard!
  2. The web version does not save your game when I publish an update! That means you will lose all your progress when I publish an update. Therefore, I recommend downloading the mobile app and playing that one instead.

Finally, please join our Discord for discussion/feedback and all the other things. See you there :)
